feed.sql: select distinct file_name, file_size_bytes from call_count where feed_type=101 and (file_first_call_time >= ? and file_first_call_time < ?) or (file_last_call_time >= ? and file_last_call_time < ?)
select distinct a.file_name, b.file_size_bytes from ra_network a, call_count b where a.call_time >= ? and a.call_time < ? and a.call_type=12 and a.file_name=b.file_name

file-report.refer-sql: select file_name, file_size_bytes, decoded_result from downloaded_file where file_name like 'b%.dat' and download_time >= ? and download_time < ?

feed.sql: select distinct a.file_name, b.file_size_bytes from ra_network a, call_count b where a.call_time >= ? and a.call_time < ? and a.call_type=46 and a.file_name=b.file_name

file-report.refer-sql: select file_name, file_size_bytes, decoded_result from downloaded_file where (file_name like 'e%.dat' or file_name like 'c%.dat') and download_time >= ? and download_time < ?

feed.sql: select distinct a.file_name, b.file_size_bytes from ra_billing a, call_count b where a.call_time >= ? and a.call_time < ? and a.billing_type=1 and a.call_type=1 and a.file_name=b.file_name

file-report.refer-sql: select file_name, file_size_bytes, decoded_result from downloaded_file where file_name like 'CCN%' and download_time >= ? and download_time < ?

feed.sql: select distinct a.file_name, b.file_size_bytes from ra_billing a, call_count b where a.call_time >= ? and a.call_time < ? and a.billing_type=2 and a.file_name=b.file_name

file-report.refer-sql: select file_name, file_size_bytes, decoded_result from downloaded_file where file_name like 'CDMDVWM%' and download_time >= ? and download_time < ?

feed.sql: select distinct a.file_name, b.file_size_bytes from ra_billing a, call_count b where a.call_time >= ? and a.call_time < ? and a.billing_type=3 and a.file_name=b.file_name

file-report.refer-sql: select file_name, file_size_bytes, decoded_result from downloaded_file where file_name like 'CD%' and file_name not like 'CDMDVWM%' and download_time >= ? and download_time < ?

feed.sql: select distinct a.file_name, b.file_size_bytes from ra_billing a, call_count b where a.call_time >= ? and a.call_time < ? and a.billing_type=6 and a.call_type in (1,29) and a.file_name=b.file_name

file-report.refer-sql: select file_name, file_size_bytes, decoded_result from downloaded_file where file_name like 'RTX%' and download_time >= ? and download_time < ?

feed.sql: select distinct a.file_name, b.file_size_bytes from ra_billing a, call_count b where a.call_time >= ? and a.call_time < ? and a.billing_type=6 and a.call_type in (1,29) and a.file_name=b.file_name

file-report.refer-sql: select file_name, file_size_bytes, decoded_result from downloaded_file where file_name like 'WAM%' and download_time >= ? and download_time < ?

sql.value: select * from calls_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (1,2)
select * from calls_nodup_redo where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (1,2)
select * from ra_billing where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 0 and call_type in (1,2)

select a.*, 0 as volume_download,0 as volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from calls_nodup a where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type = 1 and duration>1 and o_msisdn not in (929,960929,88888888,96088888888)

select a.*, 0 as volume_download,0 as volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from calls_nodup_redo a where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type = 1 and duration>1 and o_msisdn not in (929,960929,88888888,96088888888)
select * from ra_billing_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 1 and feed_type=306 and call_type = 1 and duration > 1
select * from ra_billing_nodup_redo where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 1 and feed_type=306 and call_type = 1 and duration > 1

select a.*, 0 as volume_download,0 as volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from calls_nodup a where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (1,2,29) and s_msisdn not like '960%' and s_msisdn not like '125%'

select a.*, 0 as volume_download,0 as volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from calls_nodup_redo a where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (1,2,29) and s_msisdn not like '960%' and s_msisdn not like '125%'
select * from ra_billing_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 2 and call_type in (1,2)
select * from ra_billing_nodup_redo where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 2 and call_type in (1,2)

select call_time,(volume_download+volume_upload) as duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn,o_msisdn,s_imsi,s_imei,s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,feed_type,billing_type,insert_time,file_name,call_id,volume_download,volume_upload,charge_identifier,sgsn_address,ggsn_address,pdp_address,forwarded_num from ra_network_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (12) and s_msisdn not like '960%'

select call_time,(volume_download+volume_upload) as duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn,o_msisdn,s_imsi,s_imei,s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,feed_type,billing_type,insert_time,file_name,call_id,volume_download,volume_upload,charge_identifier,sgsn_address,ggsn_address,pdp_address,forwarded_num from ra_network_nodup_redo as a where call_time>=? and call_time < ? and call_type in (12) and s_msisdn not like '960%' and not exists (select * from ra_network_nodup_redo as b where volume_upload/1024=0 and volume_download/1024=0 and a.call_id=b.call_id)

select call_time,(volume_download+volume_upload) as duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn,o_msisdn,s_imsi,s_imei,s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,feed_type,billing_type,insert_time,file_name,call_id,volume_download,volume_upload,charge_identifier,sgsn_address,ggsn_address,pdp_address,call_amount,forwarded_num from ra_billing_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 2 and call_type in (12)

select call_time,(volume_download+volume_upload) as duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn,o_msisdn,s_imsi,s_imei,s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,feed_type,billing_type,insert_time,file_name,call_id,volume_download,volume_upload,charge_identifier,sgsn_address,ggsn_address,pdp_address,call_amount,forwarded_num from ra_billing_nodup_redo as a where call_time>= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 2 and call_type in (12) and not exists (select * from ra_billing_nodup_redo as b where volume_upload/1024=0 and volume_download/1024=0 and a.call_id=b.call_id)

select call_time,(volume_download+volume_upload) as duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn,o_msisdn,s_imsi,s_imei,s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,feed_type,billing_type,insert_time,file_name,call_id,volume_download,volume_upload,charge_identifier,sgsn_address,ggsn_address,pdp_address,forwarded_num from ra_network_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (46) and sgsn_address not in ('202.153.87.166','202.153.87.167')

select call_time,(volume_download+volume_upload) as duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn,o_msisdn,s_imsi,s_imei,s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,feed_type,billing_type,insert_time,file_name,call_id,volume_download,volume_upload,charge_identifier,sgsn_address,ggsn_address,pdp_address,forwarded_num from ra_network_nodup_redo where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (46) and sgsn_address not in ('202.153.87.166','202.153.87.167')

select call_time,(volume_download+volume_upload) as duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn,o_msisdn,s_imsi,s_imei,s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,feed_type,billing_type,insert_time,file_name,call_id,volume_download,volume_upload,charge_identifier,sgsn_address,ggsn_address,pdp_address,call_amount,forwarded_num from ra_billing_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 3 and call_type in (12,46)

select call_time,(volume_download+volume_upload) as duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn,o_msisdn,s_imsi,s_imei,s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,feed_type,billing_type,insert_time,file_name,call_id,volume_download,volume_upload,charge_identifier,sgsn_address,ggsn_address,pdp_address,call_amount,forwarded_num from ra_billing_nodup_redo where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 3 and call_type in (12,46)

(select call_id, o_call_id,call_time,duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn, o_msisdn, s_imsi,s_imei, s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,0 as volume_download,0 as volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from calls_nodup a where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (1,2,30,31) and s_imsi!=0 and s_imsi not like '47202%') UNION (select call_id, 0 as o_call_id,call_time,duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn, o_msisdn, s_imsi,s_imei, s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator, volume_download, volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from ra_billing_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 2 and call_type = 12 and s_imsi not like '47202%')

(select call_id, o_call_id,call_time,duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn, o_msisdn, s_imsi,s_imei, s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator,0 as volume_download,0 as volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from calls_nodup_redo a where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (1,2,30,31) and s_imsi!=0 and s_imsi not like '47202%') UNION (select call_id, 0 as o_call_id,call_time,duration,call_type,sw_id,s_msisdn, o_msisdn, s_imsi,s_imei, s_ci,s_lac,trunk_in,trunk_out,term_cause,term_reason,ss_code,charge_indicator, volume_download, volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from ra_billing_nodup_redo where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 2 and call_type = 12 and s_imsi not like '47202%')

select a.*, 0 as volume_download,0 as volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from calls_nodup a where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (1,29)

select a.*, 0 as volume_download,0 as volume_upload,0 as charge_identifier,'' as sgsn_address, '' as ggsn_address, '' as pdp_address,''as file_name from calls_nodup_redo a where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and call_type in (1,29)
select * from ra_billing_nodup where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 6 and call_type in (1,29)
select * from ra_billing_nodup_redo where call_time >= ? and call_time < ? and billing_type = 6 and call_type in (1,29)
select * from calls_igw where call_time >= ? and call_time < ?
select * from hot_irsf_num
select * from suspect_irsf_num
select * from calls_nodup where s_imsi not like '47202%' and call_type=1 and call_time >= ? and call_time < ? order by s_msisdn
select * from tap_code
select * from calls where call_type in (1,2,18,27,28,29) and call_time >= ? and call_time <= ?
select * from cdr_detail where call_type in(1,2,18,27,28,29) and (in_traffic_type in(3) or out_traffic_type in(3))
select * from cdr_detail where call_type in(1,2,18,27,28,29) and (in_traffic_type in(2) or out_traffic_type in(2))
select * from cdr_detail where call_type in(27)
